sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- No changes to template section -->
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'StreamCheck',
  data() {
    return {
      // No changes to data section
    }
  },
  computed: {
    // No changes to computed section
  },
  created() {
    // No changes to created section
  },
  beforeDestroy() {
    // No changes to beforeDestroy section
  },
  methods: {
    // No changes to methods section
  },
  watch: {
    // No changes to watch section
    'linkForm.format'() {
      if (this.generateLinkDialogVisible) {
        this.handleGenerateLink()
      }
    },
    'syncForm': {
      handler(newVal) {
        if (newVal.autoSync) {
        this.setupSyncSchedule()
      } else {
        this.clearSyncSchedule()
      }
      },
      deep: true
    }
  },
  activated() {
    if (this.isScheduled) {
      this.setupSchedule()
    }
    if (this.isCollecting) {
      this.startCollecting(true)
    }
    if (this.syncForm.autoSync) {
      this.setupSyncSchedule()
    }
  },
  deactivated() {
    if (this.scheduleTimer) {
      clearInterval(this.scheduleTimer)
      this.scheduleTimer = null
    }
    if (this.collectTimer) {
      clearInterval(this.collectTimer)
      this.collectTimer = null
    }
    if (this.syncTimer) {
      clearInterval(this.syncTimer)
      this.syncTimer = null
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
/* No changes to style section */
</style>
